definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be healthy, strong (NH id.; Aram. h.lam Ethp. be made healthy, strong, Aph. causat., also deriv.; [[חֲלַם]] press firmly together)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יַחְלְמוּ בְנֵיהֶם]] Job 39:4 their young are healthy.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[וְתַחֲלִימֵנִי]] Is 38:16 and restore me to health (‖[[וְהַחֲיֵ֫ינִי]]).
